exercise.title: Dir 24 Hours
exercise.name: dir_24hrs
exercise.shortdescription: Script to show a system dir of 24hr +/- of a Modified/Creation Date
exercise.description: Python Script to show you all files on a computer that have been modified or created within a 24 hour window of a given date.
exercise.tutorial:
Malware will often create or install other files when it is initially installed. Write a python script that takes a creation or modified date as an argument and returns all created or modified files on the system within a 24 hour period of the given date.

Create the following command line options:

-c : from creation date

-m : from modified date

-drive : specify which drive to do a full recursive dir. (default: C:\)

Example: python change_check.py -drive C:\ -c 2016-08-08

 

Helpful link:

http://www.tutorialspoint.com/python/python_command_line_arguments.htm

 

Email your code to adelphi-training-team@googlegroups.com for code review when you are finished.
